title: Request customer satisfaction rating via Google or Facebook review

value: Request #{{ticket.id}}: How would you rate the support you received?

Hello {{ticket.requester.name}}, We would love you to review our customer service, if you haven't already done so. Write a review on Google or on Facebook. IT Solver didn't meet expectations? Reply to this email with feedback so we can improve. Here's a reminder of what your ticket was about: {{ticket.comments_formatted}}
